name: The Creatures
description:
The Creatures is a small game where you work as a creature trainer for a lab. You have to combine 2 creatures to train their cross-breed until its an adult by giving it meds. The creatures are wild and they will follow and try to kill you but you have to have them follow you by moving them in the direction of the meds and they need 10 meds to become adults. 

Controls:

Movement: WASD, TFGH or Arrow Keys

Interaction: Space or Arrow Keys

Made in 8 days by Cybeartron for the Godot Wild Jam #43.

All of the work in the project has been done solely by me using the TY - TaikonColor 16 Palette (lospec.com) from lospec.

The game is not in a good condition due to me being ill during development. I hope you still like it.
